ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya know.  When we were all level 7 and just starting out I remember HQ Pelts going for oh... 3-4 pp.  There weren t 50 s running around with excess cash just
ygData.messageBody:
Ya know. When we were all level 7 and just starting out I remember HQ Pelts
going for oh... 3-4 pp. There weren't 50's running around with excess cash
just falling out of their pockets back then.

Don't belittle him just because he sold his item for a price he liked. I
fail to understand the mentality that so many players have that "You're a
fool because you sold that item for XYZ coins!" It's his business and he
had his reasons. Picking on him is just going to make him feel put upon and
put down on. He chose to do it, it's over. He knows he could have made
more money.

Picking on him about it really is out of line. Especially when I'm sure
each of us, at one time or another, has made a stupid sale or trade. I
still remember my bonehead self trading a Bloodstained Tunic for a EXEC hood
once. Then I found out that the BS Tunic had gone up in price to almost
1000 pp (this was when rubicite was still in the game and a BS Tunic went
for 900-1200pp)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 5:06 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Slashing weapons for bards question...


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Fri, 24 Mar 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
> >
> > > I'm not too concerned if I couldn't have gotten more out of it. For
one
> > > thing, I've never been offered more than 7 pp for those HQ bear skins.
For
> > > another thing, FS weopons cost a lot more than I can afford from
vendors,
> > > and I had killed enough bears that I didn't mind trading one of the
skins
> > > away. I still have more.
> >
> > There's only one thing a HQ bear pelt is good for, and you've got to
> > understand that higher level players have at least a little money to
> > throw around. Don't feel bad if you are asking more than what you
> > think the worth of something is, regardless of how easy it was to
> > acquire.
>
> I agree with Harmonic. The person who bought them from you
> for 7pp was laughing all the way to the bank. 7pp is spare
> change for anyone L35+. Heck, I give 5pp for binds because
> plat is so easy to come by.
>
> I changed my bind point from North Freeport to West Freeport.
> Now when I die, I run over to EC and kill bears while waiting
> for a res. Picked up a HQ bear pelt last night. :)
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
